resources.string: Music is love, Music is life!
Playlist name cannot begin with digit
Artist info not available at the moment, try again later
Sorry, Unable to share this file
Error loading image, Please try another one
No equalizer application found in device
No music found. Play some Music for artist information to be displayed.
Reading phone state is necessary to control playback during calls!
Please provide storage permission from Settings for app to work properly
You already have removed the ads!
You have removed the ads! Voila
If you still see the ads, please restart the app!
One of the song is playing currently
No info available at the moment!
Something wrong! Track may be deleted or storage is not available at this time
Sign in with Google to get 1000 Reward Points! It won\'t take more than 10 seconds.

How often have you ruined the song because of wrong touch! Imagine you are enjoying the best part of the song while going through library and by mistake you click on some song and baaam, your mood is ruined. This button is here for rescue. Whenever you want to enjoy a song without interruption and browse gallery meanwhile, just lock the music by using this button and player will not change song unless and until you unlock it again!
You have received 1000 Reward Points. Want to spread the word?
Nah, I will do that later
It seems this email id has already been registered with us. Reward points are granted only once per Email id!"
Swipe right for Artist Bio and left for Lyrics
Loving AB Music? Please take a time to rate it on store.
If you enjoy using AB Music, please consider supporting the development by buying me a Coffee or something. Thanks for your support!
All the changes done in music tag are local to device. Actual audio file is not modified!
Please provide permission for AB Music to record audio. It will be used for showing cool visualization surrounding disc.
To apply new font, AB Music needs to be restarted. You can do it now or later.
Please provide write setting permission for application to change Ringtone

Apologies for the inconvenience! 

 Fetching music information from other music players is tricky business and most of the times they will not broadcast current music progress information (either intentionally or because of sloppy developers like me!) 

 So what AB Music does is that it stores the time at which music was started and accordingly try to sync lyrics with it. If while playback, you choose to pause or seek the music track in other player, AB Music loses track of time and thus lyrics may go out of sync. 

 Unfortunately this is how Android works!
To exclude folder from library, go to Folders section in Main library and select \'Exclude from Library\' option from pop up menu for particular folder.

AB Music utilizes 2-7 reward points for displaying 1 lyric. To refill reward points, click on Refill button below to watch an ad. Your account will be refilled with anything between 200-500 reward points.
Please wait while we load your reward video…
Your current reward points count is
Your reward points have been exhausted, please refill to continue getting lyrics. Click here to refill now!

You do not seem to have enough Reward Points for downloading batch lyrics. If you choose to start batch lyrics download anyway, download will be skipped as soon as reward points are exhausted. 

 Reward points you have : %d 
 Reward points you need : %d
We are unable to give you any reward points, click on refill to try again!
You have already claimed reward points for rating AB Music in store!

For AB Music to work correctly, following permissions are needed. 

 * Phone state : For controlling playback during calls 

 * Storage : For reading music on SD Card 

 * Record Audio(Optional) : For showing cool animation in Now playing screen
Enabling this will allow AB Music to show notifications about trending lyrics and new exciting offers!

Enabling this allows AB Music to fetch Lyrics whenever Music starts playing in your device, no matter in which application. Whenever you play music in your device, notification will be displayed for fetching lyrics. Most major online music players are supported. If it doesn\'t work well with the music player you use, let me know. Turn on now to get Instant Lyrics.

Your ads will be removed for free after clicking button below, but make sure to return the favour and follow and shout out for me on Instagram. I hope you would do that!


 I get it, nobody likes to see advertisement while using Application. But developing this app took me great efforts and I like being rewarded with little bucks I make with the advertisements.


 I would highly appreciate if you could remove ads by paying one time very small amount towards my account. But if you don't want to do that, that is fine.


 And if you love using Ad-Free AB Music, I know for a fact that you would consider donating few bucks for me by going in Settings -> About -> Support Development. Have a nice day and cheers!"

Google any Color you like and Enter hex string of that color in the form of #XXXXXX 

 For e.g. 
 BLACK = #000000 
 RED = #ff0000
Enabling this makes sure that Music Playback will go on continuously (Even if Queue is empty). This feature is in Beta stage.
Tap the button to lock the music!
Get running Lyrics and Artist info in one tap!
Try sorting your music on the go!
Unable to search artist bio, make sure that audio tags are correct and touch here to retry!
Unable to fetch artist bio, Please make sure audio is correctly tagged! \n Touch here to retry!
Please make sure audio tags are correct!
Lyrics not found, Touch here to retry!
No connection! Touch here to retry!

Lyrics obtained from ViewLyrics.com! \n Lyrics are property of their respective owner and I claim no right on it! \n If you think, copyright infringement is happening, please drop a mail to contact in about section and I will take the content down!

AB Music (Version 1.0)
 Made by Amit Bhandari | All Copyrights Reserved 

 AB Music is absolutely legal and does not host or upload any lyrics. AB Music simply aggregate lyrics in convenient and user-friendly environment. AB Music is not responsible for the accuracy, compliance, copyright, legality, decency or any other aspect of content of other linked sites. If you have any legal issues, please contact the appropriate lyrics website owner or host sites. Any legal issues regarding lyrics in this app should be taken up with actual lyrics hosting websites themselves as we are not affiliated with them. 

 In case of copyright infringement, please directly contact the responsible parties. AB Music acts like search engine of lyrics found publicly on internet, in principle conducting same way as Google! However AB music strongly believes in protection of Intellectual Property and will be willing to assist when possible and applicable.
Cannot display lyrics right now! Please press back and try again!
Touch the album art to change
You have made changes in some tags, do you want to save those?
Hold the Handle and Drag the Tabs to Change the Sequence on Startup Screen.
Enjoy the best free Offline Music Experience with AB Music
\u0020* My new app is out on store. Check out the side navigation drawer.
Now fetch lyrics instantly as you play music on your device (All major applications supported including Saavn, Gaana, Google Play and Spotify)
For AB Music to work with all apps, some settings needs to be changed!
Equalizer is not Supported by your device.
Unable to connect to Internet, click here to retry!
Error fetching data, Please make sure you are connected!

Hey there, this is AB here. 

 I am glad you are enjoying AB Music (if you are not, write me to let me know why) and it needs your help. To reach global audience, AB Music needs to be translated to regional languages and if you happen to know one and can translate English to that, please contribute! Write me to know more on how to get started with translations. 

 If you don't want to help in translations, that's totally cool, but if you like AB Music, be sure to leave your feedback on store.

Prevent loading Artist Images instead of default artwork by turning on data saver. \n\n Though it is recommended to keep it in default setting as it highly affects look and feel of AB Music. All the artist images are cached locally to prevent data usage in either case.

Pay one time and enjoy Ad free Superfast experience of AB Music for life time!\n\n Loading ads from network uses resources and thus slow down AB Music a little (very little). Removing ads will make AB Music lightning fast to operate and will get rid of all kind of advertisements from app.
All the libraries are licensed under apache license. You can see license on a link given below.
All the artist bio and images have copyright of last.fm and I claim no ownership for those!

Invite one of your friend to AB Music and enjoy ad-free experience lifetime. \n\n Please note, invitation is successful only on new install. If person you invited already has AB Music installed, it will not work.
Invitation not sent, Please try again!
